2010-10-24

It makes me feel better #11 Melanie... but only in very small doses

Melanie showed up on the last show in BBC4's Singer Songwriters at the BBC series... I loved Brand New Key when I was a kid... and there was Ruby Tuesday... but that voice... listening to two songs in a row is a bit hard on anyone... here... give it a go...


Brand New Key



Ruby Tuesday


Tough... wasn't it?
